comments.body: Are these really standard abbreviations or do you think it would be better to spell these out? For stuff like "roc" I can see it being pretty standard.

comments.body: Good question. I see many places use TP/FP/TP/TN, but I always need to translate the acronyms back to their full names in order to understand. Will switch to full names.
